MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW10 postcode area of Middlewich affecting properties in Pennymoor Drive, Honiton Way, Dexter Way and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 8:47am. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the powercut. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 11:00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:16am on 23rd October 2020.
